contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=March 2011}} {{Infobox mountain | name = Herðubreið | photo = Herðubreið-Iceland-2.jpg | photo_caption = Herðubreið, viewed from the southeast | elevation_m = 1,682 | elevation_ref = | prominence = | listing = [[List of volcanoes in Iceland]] | location = [[Iceland|Eastern Iceland]] | map = Iceland |relief=1 | region = IS | lat_d = 65 | lat_m = 10 | lat_s = 44.06 | lat_NS = N | long_d= 16 | long_m= 20 | long_s= 50.36 | long_EW= W | coordinates_ref = | range = | topo = | type = [[Tuya]] | age = [[Pleistocene]] | last_eruption = [[Pleistocene]] | first_ascent = | easiest_route = }} '''Herðubreið''' ({{IPA-is|ˈhɛrðʏpreiθ}}, ''broad-shouldered'') is a [[tuya]] in north-east [[Iceland]]. It is situated in the [[Highlands of Iceland]] in the midst of the ''[[Ódáðahraun]]'' [[desert]] and close to [[Askja]] volcano. The desert is a large [[lava]] field originating from [[eruption]]s of ''[[Trölladyngja]]''. Herðubreið was formed beneath the icesheet that covered [[Iceland]] during the last [[glacial period]].<ref>{{cite web|last=Teitsson|first=Ingvar|title=Herðubreið - Drottning íslenskra fjalla|url=http://www.landvernd.is/arfjalla2002/fjall_06.html|work=International year of mountains 2002|publisher=Icelandic Environment Association|accessdate=19.10.2011}}</ref> ==Overview== Due to the mountain's steep and unstable sides, the first ascent was in 1908 despite centuries of knowledge of its existence.{{Citation needed|date=June 2010}} Near the mountain lies an [[oasis]] called ''Herðubreiðarlindir'' with a campground and hiking trails. In former times, outcasts who had been excluded from Icelandic society because of crimes they had committed lived at the oasis.{{Citation needed|date=June 2010}} One such outlaw was [[Fjalla-Eyvindur]], who lived there during the winter of 1774–1775.<ref>[http://www.frommers.com/destinations/askjaandkverkfjoll/4117013461.html Askja and Kverkfjoll: Exploring the Area], Frommer's ''Iceland'', 1st Edition.</ref> ==See also== * [[Geography of Iceland]] * [[Volcanism in Iceland]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category-inline|Herdubreid}} ;Images: * [http://islandsmyndir.is/html_skjol/halendid/Herdubreidarlindir-2009-06-29/index.html Herðubreiðarlindir – picture gallery from islandsmyndir.is] * http://isafold.de/panorama/panoram.htm (via "Askja") [[Category:Mountains of Iceland]] [[Category:Tuyas of Iceland]] [[Category:Pleistocene volcanoes]] [[Category:Iceland North Volcanic Zone]]
